channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- BuddyForms WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- BuddyForms WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-26326|2023-02-23T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- buddyforms%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The BuddyForms WordPress plugin, in versions prior to 2.7.8, was affected by an unauthenticated insecure deserialization issue. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this issue to call files using a PHAR wrapper that will deserialize the data and call arbitrary PHP Objects that can be used to perform a variety of malicious actions granted a POP chain is also present.
